source.title: AI Trends 2026: Quantum, Agentic AI & Smarter Automation

trends.title: Multi-Agent Orchestration
trends.summary: Teams of AI agents (planner, worker, critic) collaborate under an orchestrator. Cross-checking and discrete verifiable steps improve reliability.

trends.title: Digital Labor Workforce
trends.summary: Autonomous agents parse tasks via multimodal input, execute workflows, and integrate with systems. Human-in-the-loop provides oversight and correction.

trends.title: Physical AI
trends.summary: Models understand the 3D world through simulation training. World foundation models enable humanoid robots to move from research to commercial production.

trends.title: Social Computing
trends.summary: Agents and humans share an AI fabric for context exchange and collaboration. Creates collective intelligence and real-world swarm computing.

trends.title: Verifiable AI
trends.summary: EU AI Act mandates auditable, traceable AI systems. Requires documentation, transparency, and data lineage - setting global AI governance template.

trends.title: Quantum Utility
trends.summary: Quantum computing solves real problems faster than classical methods. Hybrid quantum-classical systems deliver value in optimization, simulation, and decisions.

trends.title: Reasoning at the Edge
trends.summary: Smaller models (few billion params) learn to reason via distillation. Work offline with no data center latency - critical for real-time applications.

trends.title: Amorphous Hybrid Computing
trends.summary: AI models blend transformers + state-space architectures. Cloud combines CPUs, GPUs, TPUs, QPUs into unified compute with automatic optimal mapping.
